short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension makes it easy to read IETF RFCs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: If you have ever tried reading IETF RFCs, you would have realized how bad its UI is. This chrome extension aims to simplify the RFC reading experience on https://www.rfc-editor.org/.
